member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16
member.summary: A generalized CRC-16 algorithm.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.NormalLookupTables
member.summary: The lookup tables for non-reversed polynomials.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.ReversedLookupTables
member.summary: The lookup tables for reversed polynomials.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.lookupTable
member.summary: A reference to the lookup table.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.definition
member.summary: The CRC-32 algorithm definition.

member.name: F:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.remainder
member.summary: The current value of the remainder.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.#ctor(Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition,System.UInt16[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified definition and lookup table.
member.param: The CRC-16 algorithm definition. May not be null.
The lookup table. May not be null.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.#ctor(Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified definition.
member.param: The CRC-16 algorithm definition.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default definition.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.FindOrGenerateLookupTable(Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition)
member.summary: Searches the known lookup tables for one matching the given CRC-16 definition; if none is found, a new lookup table is generated and added to the known lookup tables.
member.param: The CRC-16 definition. May not be null.
member.returns: The lookup table for the given CRC-16 definition.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.GenerateLookupTable(Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition)
member.summary: Generates a lookup table for a CRC-16 algorithm definition. Both and are used in the calculations.
member.param: The CRC-16 algorithm definition. May not be null.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the CRC-16 calculations.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.HashCore(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.
member.param: The input to compute the hash code for.
The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.
The number of bytes in the byte array to use as data.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.HashFinal
member.summary: Finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.ReflectedIndex(System.UInt16,System.Byte)
member.summary: Gets the index into the lookup array for a given remainder and data byte. Data byte reversal is taken into account.
member.param: The current remainder.
The data byte.
member.returns: The index into the lookup array.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.ReflectedShift(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Shifts a byte out of the remainder. This is the high byte or low byte, depending on whether the data bytes are reversed.
member.param: The remainder value.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Result
member.summary: Gets the result of the CRC-16 algorithm.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition
member.summary: Holds parameters for a CRC-16 algorithm.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.Create
member.summary: Creates a new instance using this definition.
member.returns: A new instance using this definition.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.Default
member.summary: Gets a common CRC-16, used by ARC and LHA.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.CcittFalse
member.summary: Gets a CRC-16 used by floppy disk formats, commonly misidentified as CCITT.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.Ccitt
member.summary: Gets a CRC-16 known as CCITT, used by Kermit. Appears in "Numerical Recipes in C".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.XModem
member.summary: Gets a CRC-16 used by XMODEM and ZMODEM. Appears in "Numerical Recipes in C".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.X25
member.summary: Gets a CRC-16 used by X.25, V.42, T.30, RFC 1171. Appears in "Numerical Recipes in C".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.TruncatedPolynomial
member.summary: Gets or sets the normal (non-reversed, non-reciprocal) polynomial to use for the CRC calculations.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.Initializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to which the remainder is initialized at the beginning of the CRC calculation.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.FinalXorValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the value by which the remainder is XOR'ed at the end of the CRC calculation.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.ReverseDataBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether incoming data bytes are reversed/reflected.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC16.Definition.ReverseResultBeforeFinalXor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the final remainder is reversed/reflected at the end of the CRC calculation before it is XOR'ed with .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified definition.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default definition. Note that the "default" CRC-32 definition is an older IEEE recommendation and there are better polynomials for new protocols.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.FindOrGenerateLookupTable(Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition)
member.summary: Searches the known lookup tables for one matching the given CRC-32 definition; if none is found, a new lookup table is generated and added to the known lookup tables.
member.param: The CRC-32 definition.
member.returns: The lookup table for the given CRC-32 definition.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.GenerateLookupTable(Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition)
member.summary: Generates a lookup table for a CRC-32 algorithm definition. Both and are used in the calculations.
member.param: The CRC-32 algorithm definition.

member.summary: Initializes the CRC-32 calculations.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.summary: Routes data written to the object into the hash algorithm for computing the hash.
member.param: The input to compute the hash code for.
The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.
The number of bytes in the byte array to use as data.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.HashFinal
member.summary: Finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.

member.summary: Gets the index into the lookup array for a given remainder and data byte. Data byte reversal is taken into account.
member.param: The current remainder.
The data byte.
member.returns: The index into the lookup array.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.ReflectedShift(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Shifts a byte out of the remainder. This is the high byte or low byte, depending on whether the data bytes are reversed.
member.param: The remainder value.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Result
member.summary: Gets the result of the CRC-32 algorithm.

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition
member.summary: Holds parameters for a CRC-32 algorithm.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Create
member.summary: Creates a new instance using this definition.
member.returns: A new instance using this definition.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Default
member.summary: Gets a CRC-32 defined by the old IEEE standard; used by Ethernet, zip, PNG, etc. Note that this "default" CRC-32 definition is an older IEEE recommendation and there are better polynomials for new protocols. Known as "CRC-32", "CRC-32/ADCCP", and "PKZIP".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.BZip2
member.summary: Gets a CRC-32 used by BZIP2. Known as "CRC-32/BZIP2" and "B-CRC-32".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Castagnoli
member.summary: Gets a modern CRC-32 defined in RFC 3720. Known as "CRC-32C", "CRC-32/ISCSI", and "CRC-32/CASTAGNOLI".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Mpeg2
member.summary: Gets a CRC-32 used by the MPEG-2 standard. Known as "CRC-32/MPEG-2".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Posix
member.summary: Gets a CRC-32 used by the POSIX "chksum" command; note that the chksum command-line program appends the file length to the contents unless it is empty. Known as "CRC-32/POSIX" and "CKSUM".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Aixm
member.summary: Gets a CRC-32 used in the Aeronautical Information eXchange Model. Known as "CRC-32Q".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Xfer
member.summary: Gets a very old CRC-32, appearing in "Numerical Recipes in C". Known as "XFER".

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.TruncatedPolynomial
member.summary: Gets or sets the normal (non-reversed, non-reciprocal) polynomial to use for the CRC calculations.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.Initializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the value to which the remainder is initialized at the beginning of the CRC calculation.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.FinalXorValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the value by which the remainder is XOR'ed at the end of the CRC calculation.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.ReverseDataBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether incoming data bytes are reversed/reflected.

member.name: P:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.CRC32.Definition.ReverseResultBeforeFinalXor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the final remainder is reversed/reflected at the end of the CRC calculation before it is XOR'ed with .

member.name: T:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.HackersDelight
member.summary: Helpful methods from the book Hacker's Delight.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.HackersDelight.Reverse(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Reverses the bits in an unsigned integer of data.
member.param: The unsigned integer whose bits are to be reversed.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.HackersDelight.Reverse(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Reverses the bits in an unsigned short of data.
member.param: The unsigned short whose bits are to be reversed.

member.name: M:Nito.KitchenSink.CRC.HackersDelight.Reverse(System.Byte)
member.summary: Reverses the bits in a byte of data.
member.param: The byte whose bits are to be reversed.
